about_the_game:
Traveling alone is not difficult at all, but with a companion to solve loneliness, it could be even better. Shared experiences and lasting memories make the journey more fulfilling. Solo travel offers freedom, while accompanied travel provides companionship.



No more loneliness, the Companion brings companionship and empathy. Plus, it collects dropped monster items, making your adventures more convenient.
